1. Sir Keir Starmer regrets Alaa Abd El Fattah welcome after 'abhorrent' posts came to light  BBC
  2. Home Secretary refuses to use powers to deport ‘extremist’  The Telegraph
  3. Starmer says he was not aware of ‘abhorrent’ comments by Egyptian activist he welcomed  The Times of Israel
  4. Distractions over Abd el-Fattah were running joke, says ex-Starmer adviser  The Guardian
  5. Tapp: Govt should have known about activist's old tweets  ITN Productions
